descriptionHtml:
Big and beautiful weapons
release date : January 2012
Category: Weapons
Mod version : 0.9
Author: Hentai


Description
===========
This mod Adds 4kinds of big weapons(precisely speaking, it\'ll replace original weapons)
My intension is that every gears I\'ll made is going to be given as a quest reward. But since there is no edit-tools available, I think it is easy to simply replace original weapons.
There are four weapons in this mods
 
 - Ebony Battleaxe (Two-hands)
 - Ebony Warhammer (Two-hands)
 - Ebony GreatSword (Two-hands)
 - Orchish GreatSword (Two-hands)

When tool is released, all weapons above will be given it\'s own names and become quest reward.
Oh, and one more thing. It\'s my first challenge in Skyrim. I hope you like it.


Install
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and paste them in your Skyrim/Data folder. 


Uninstall
=========
Delete:
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\Ebony and Orchish folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\Ebony folder


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.


Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop
CrazyBump


Permissions
==========
The model and texture were created for free use until 1.0 version of this mod is released(As soon as the tool is released). 
I beg your patience.
author: Hentai
